articles.author: Maggie Shiltagh
articles.title: Anti-American Sentiment Rises in Europe as Trump Fuels Anger - Bloomberg
articles.description: Rising anti-American sentiment in Europe as President Donald Trump’s policies ruffle feathers is ushering in a shift in consumer behavior, not least in attitudes toward American goods.
articles.content:
Rising anti-American sentiment in Europe as President Donald Trumps policies ruffle feathers is ushering in a shift in consumer behavior, not least in attitudes toward American goods.
